name: ConstantRandomPings
short: Wanna annoy people during April Fools? Ping them at random at set interval!
description: Constant random pings sound horrible... Please don't do this...
install_msg: You're a bad person for installing ConstantRandomPings. Seriously. Why do you have to be so annoying!?
author: Jakub Kuczys (https://github.com/Jackenmen)
